Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Positive Bacterial Infections/Actinomycetales Infections/Mycobacterium Infections/Tuberculosis/Tuberculosis, Avian
Record.Description: A variety of TUBERCULOSIS affecting various birds, including chickens and ducks. It is caused by MYCOBACTERIUM AVIUM and characterized by tubercles consisting principally of epithelioid cells.
